comments:
wtp-sdk-I20041221.zip

After opening an XML file and choosing the Preferences context menu action, I
went to the Hovers tab, clicked around, and pressed OK.  I was notified that
there was an error notifying a preference change listener 3 separate times.  The
following ended up in my .log 3 separate times:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.runtime 4 2 2004-12-22 02:38:49.895

Unable to reproduce with WTP 1.0 M4.

I think there is a regression in R-0.7-200507290654

Steps to reproduce:
- open Java editor preferences.
- enable all hovers
- disable all hovers
